CustomField.description:
Used to determine type of a line item for use in Cost & Profitability Price Waterfall
if checked, item is a Price Point. If unchecked, item is an Adjustment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Used to determine type of a line item for use in Cost & Profitability Price Waterfall
if checked, item is a Price Point. If unchecked, item is an Adjustment.
CustomField.label: Is Price Point
